DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to collect data on treatment outcomes (clinical and microbiological cure), safety and tolerability of treatment with cefoperazone/sulbactam in patients with serious intra-abdominal and hepatobiliary infections in Slovakia.
DOC.brief_title: Cefoperazone/Sulbactam In The Treatment Of Serious Intra-Abdominal And Hepatobiliary Infections.
DOC.criteria: Male or female patient of age 18 years or older. Patient with intraabdominal/hepatobiliary infection.? Patients with known hypersensitivity to penicillins, cephalosporins, cefoperazone or to sulbactam.
